faqs.question: How does simpleroomsng.com ensure no agents are involved in listings?
faqs.answer: We have a strict no-agent policy. Every landlord or property owner is verified directly through our secure onboarding process. If we detect any agent posing as a landlord while violating our strict policy, their account is immediately suspended.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden fees or commissions?
faqs.answer: Absolutely none! simpleroomsng operates on a zero-commission model—you deal directly with landlords, so there are no middlemen fees, no agent commissions, and no surprises.

faqs.question: What happens if someone demands an "agent fee" or "registration fee"?
faqs.answer: This is against our policy. Report them immediately via our 24/7 CHAT LIVE, and we will take action, including delisting fraudulent properties and blocking violators.

faqs.question: How do I verify that a landlord is legitimate?
faqs.answer: We conduct ID verification, property documentation checks, and phone authentication for all landlords. You can also check our "Verified Landlord" badge on listings for added trust.

faqs.question: Can I negotiate rent directly with the landlord?
faqs.answer: Yes! Since there are no agents, you can discuss pricing, terms, and conditions directly with the property owner—no middlemen inflating costs.

faqs.question: What if a landlord refuses to deal without an agent?
faqs.answer: Simpleroomsng does not allow such practices. If a landlord insists on using an agent while asking for commission fee, please flag the listing, and we will investigate promptly.

faqs.question: How do I schedule a property viewing?
faqs.answer: Contact the landlord directly through our secure messaging system. All communication stays within on our platform for safety and transparency.

faqs.question: Is my payment handled securely when renting through simpleroomsng?
faqs.answer: Yes, your payment is secure if the landlord uses our Rent Agreement Service. In other cases, you should only pay the landlord after signing a lease agreement. For added security, we recommend using bank transfers or legally documented payment methods.

faqs.question: What if a landlord asks for an upfront payment before viewing?
faqs.answer: Never pay before inspection! This is a red flag. Report such requests to us immediately, and we will take action.

faqs.question: How does simpleroomsng handle fraudulent listings?
faqs.answer: We use AI monitoring + manual reviews to detect scams. Users can also report suspicious listings, and our team responds within 24 hours to remove violators.
